documentation.text: @dev Reverts if not sent from the PLI token

onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes).details: The data payload's first 2 words will be overwritten by the `_sender` and `_amount` values to ensure correctness. Calls oracleRequest.

params._amount: Amount of PLI sent (specified in wei)

onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Called when PLI is sent to the contract via `transferAndCall`
